ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine I
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows colonists to grow xerigium, a medicinal herb. Allows you to build a hospital bed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build a Meditable to produce Medicine from 'Medical' Flowers and Life Support Systems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine III
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows your colonists to build the Chemical Laboratory, which can be used to create medkits and advanced prosthetic body parts. This also allows colonists to construct better hospital beds that increase the chance of successful medical work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: This unlocks the organ vat which can be used to turn human corpses into biomatter, and grow replacement organs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine V
ResearchProjectDef.description: Pharmaceuticals: Allows you to fabricate, mix and produce advanced medicines, rather then relying on natural, and less effective herbal substitutes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cybernetics I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to create new cybernetics body parts in a Chemical Laboratory.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cybernetics II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to create additional new cybernetics body parts in a Chemical Laboratory.
